channel.title: üè¢ National University of Singapore on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ National University of Singapore on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: OminiControl: Minimal and Universal Control for Diffusion Transformer
item.description: OminiControl: A minimal, universal framework efficiently integrates image conditions into diffusion transformers, enabling diverse and precise control over image generation.

item.title: When Precision Meets Position: BFloat16 Breaks Down RoPE in Long-Context Training
item.description: AnchorAttention enhances long-context LLMs by mitigating BFloat16’s disruptive effects on RoPE, improving performance and speeding up training.

item.title: Balancing Pipeline Parallelism with Vocabulary Parallelism
item.description: Boost large language model training speed by 51% with Vocabulary Parallelism, a novel technique that balances computation and memory usage across pipeline stages.

item.title: GenXD: Generating Any 3D and 4D Scenes
item.description: GenXD: A unified model generating high-quality 3D & 4D scenes from any number of images, advancing the field of dynamic scene generation.
